									Get Started
					
					
				

								

				

					

		

					

		
				

		

				
						
							

							
					
			
						
				
					Why Go Solar
				

				

				
				
					Solar done the Bright World way!
				

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
																														

				

					

		

					

		
				
							

							
					
			
							

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
							

		

				
			
							

		

				
			
							

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
						
				
																														

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
					Effortless and Productive
				

				

				
				
					Going solar is easy with Bright World.
				

				

				
				
									Our expert team will do all the legwork for you to go solar. We are known for our exceptional customer service. From determining whether your home is a good candidate for solar to matching you with the right system, we help make the process a breeze. From start to finish, our team and our partner installers will help ensure you have the best experience going solar with Bright World.
								

				

				
				
									
					
						
									Learn More
					
					
				

								

				

					

		

					

		
				
							

							
					
			
						
						
					
			
						
				
					Flexible financing.
				

				

				
				
									Financing home solar doesn’t have to be complicated. Bright World offers three flexible payment options, so you can choose what’s perfect for you—cash, lease, or loan.
With $0 down solar financing, you can start saving with little to no upfront costs.
								

				

				
				
									
					
						
									Explore Options
					
					
				

								

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
																														

				

					

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
						
				
																														

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
					Commitment to quality.
				

				

				
				
									Bright World is committed to ensuring you receive the best quality service, solar products, and installing services. Bright World has partnered with the premier leaders in all these areas to bring you the highest quality experience and system in the industry.
								

				

				
				
							
							
											
													
										Solar Panels
									

								
											
													
										Energy Storage
									

								
											
													
										Installation 
									

						
						

				

				
				
									
					
						
									Learn More
					
					
				

								

				

					

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
						
				
					Industry-leading warranties.

				

				

				
				
									Bright World offers one of the most comprehensive warranties in the solar industry. We offer the highest DC power output protection in the solar industry, with a 92% DC power for year 25, plus coverage for defects related to workmanship and materials for 25 years. Most importantly, we offer a hassle-free replacement, repair, or reimbursement for any defective panel.
								

				

				
				
									
					
						
									Go Solar Now
					
					
				

								

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
																														

				

					

		

					

		
					

		

					

		
				
							

							
					
			
						
				
							

						

				

				
				
					Start saving with solar today!
				

				

				
				
									Learn more about how Bright World can help you start saving money by going solar by filling out the form below, and one of our Solar Experts will call you.
								

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
							

						

				

					

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
							

		

				
			
						
						
					
			
						
				
					Testimonial
				

				

				
				
					Hear what our clients have to say!
				

				

				
				
							
			
				
											
									
							
					
						" I took the leap and switched to solar! I'm very happy I made this investment for my house and have already started saving money on my electricity bills. Maribel was extremely helpful, she walked me through every step and fully explained the advantages and initial costs so that I had all the information going in. "					

									

						
									
						
					

								Brian LoeswickGoogle Review 			

		

								

											
									
							
					
						" Very happy to have finally decided to purchase Solar Panels for my home. Bright World offered my a bundle deal wish included installation of a new roof and Central A/C unit. My Energy Advisor is always available and willing to answer follow-up questions. He is very professional, knowledgeable and courteous. Happy to be doing business with Bright World!!! "					

									

						
									
						
					

								Bob DreivisGoogle Review 			

		

								

											
									
							
					
						" We were recommended Bright World by a friend & we couldn’t be happier. Very professional service team. They laid everything out for us, very clear, answered all our question & went above & beyond to make sure we were not only comfortable but happy with our choice. Once we agreed the process was seamless. Very good experience. If you’re looking to go solar definitely give them a call! "					

									

						
									
						
					

								Jamie WilliamsGoogle Review 			

		

								

											
									
							
					
						" I highly recommend Brightworld as your choice for solar power at home. My representative alongside CEO Alex Valle were very thorough explaining the entire process in detail of how solar works and the benefits of having the service. He was even kind enough, and very professional, to make sure the installation went smoothly and also answered my last minute questions I had at the time in person. After hearing my friends experiences with other solar companies I can assure Brightworld was the best choice for my family. "					

									

						
									
						
					

								Victor CastroGoogle Review 			

		

								

											
									
							
					
						" My representative  made sure that my mom understood everything and made sure to answer any questions we may have had before moving forward. He took the extra steps in making sure we got the right amount of power and explained exaclty where the panels where  going be placed and all the benefits behind that. Best warranties in the Solar industry and Amazing Customer Service No Doubt!! If your looking in going solar definitely let them help you out you will not be disappointed! "					

									

						
									
						
					

								Michael AlvarezGoogle Review 			

		

								

											
									
							
					
						" The guys from Bright World explained and answered all our questions abt solar. They were both patient in explaining things to us. They made sure all our questions are answered in a way we understand it. With solar we can really save money and soon no more electricity bills for us! "					

									

						
									
						
					

								Billy dela TorreGoogle Review 			

		

								

											
									
							
					
						" Yo Ricardo ramos quiero dar unas palabras de mi experiencia de conocer a Luis Rea un hombre muy professional. Ellos me presentaron el plan de cómo economizar en mi factura de electricidad fueron muy claros en todo y yodesidi aser el cambio a sistema solor y estoy muy contento con todo muchas grasias. "					

									

						
									
						
					

								David RamosGoogle Review 			

		

								

											
									
							
					
						" My representative updated me throughout the entire process and gave me expectations on how long everything would take. He was very honest, fair and caring and really wanted to help my family and I save money and go solar. I have recommended Bright World to many family and friends and highly recommend them to anyone! Thank you! "					

									

						
									
						
					

								Laura DamicoGoogle Review
